instruction: Generate a feature list for an automated customer service assistant.
output:
• Provide customer service 24/7
• Proactively address customer inquiries
• Automatically recognize and respond to customer questions
• Personalize customer support experience 
• Automated customer satisfaction surveys
• Automatic response to customer complaints
• Automated customer outreach
• Automated customer follow-ups
• Automated ticketing system 
• Customizable response time
• Automated customer feedback loop
• Integration with customer databases
• Predictive analytics to anticipate customer needs
• Automated customer retention strategies
• Ability to create customer segments
• Generate customer led reports 
• Automation of customer rewards programs
• AI-controlled customer service chatbot
• Automatically generate customer FAQs 
• Automatically schedule customer appointments. 
• Automate customer journey tracking.
